competitors.name: Microsoft Azure AD
competitors.notes: Growing enterprise identity solution tied to Office 365

competitors.name: Centrify
competitors.notes: Identity and access management for hybrid IT

context: In 2015, Okta was emerging as a cloud-first identity management leader. Microsoft Azure AD was growing with Office 365 adoption but Okta focused on multi-vendor cloud environments. The identity-as-a-service market was maturing with enterprises adopting cloud SSO and identity management. Okta was preparing for its 2017 IPO. Competition centered on cloud versus on-premises deployment, with Okta positioned as the cloud-native option.
